title: Quadratic Root Finder
shortDescription: Write a program that finds the roots of a quadratic equation.
description: Write a program that takes in 3 integers and prints the roots of a quadratic equation, printing -1 if the root doesn't exist. with the numbers as it's three terms, and then prints it's roots as integers in ascending order. For example if your program takes in '1 2 3' it should print '-1 -1', if your program takes in '2 3 -5' then it should print '-2 1'. You may use the 'sqrt' function from 'math.h'.
